combatSkills.name: Oath Incarnation
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Dex. and Agi.+40% & 50% HP Regen/4 turns and Avoids K.O x1 only when HP≧1% (removed when HP<1%)

combatSkills.name: Tranquilize
combatSkills.description: [Allies] Fast Avoids K.O x1 only when HP≧10% (removed when HP<10%) & P.Resist and M.Resist+30% & 35% HP Regen/4 turns

combatSkills.name: Energize
combatSkills.description: [Allies] 30% HP Regen & [Foes] P.Resist and M.Resist-30% & Critical Rate and Penetration Rate-40%/2 turns

combatSkills.name: Calming Strike
combatSkills.description: [Foe] Super Water P.Attack w/Ultra Critical Rate & removes Str. and Mag. Buffs exc. Assist Skills

passiveSkills.name: Encouragement
passiveSkills.description: When countering, instead of attacking regularly, it (Lo) Heals an Ally. Prioritizes an Ally with lower percentage HP.
